ru.mobicomk.mfradio.controller
Class PlayerController

java.lang.Object
  ru.mobicomk.mfradio.controller.PlayerController

public class PlayerController
extends java.lang.Object

Player maker and player runner threads controller. Владеет PlayerQueue, владеет и управляет PlayerMaker-ом и PlayerRunner-ом. Создаётся для каждой новой интернет радиостанции.

Author:
Roman Bondarenko

Method Detail

init

public void init(StationInfo si)
          throws java.lang.Exception
Second level initialize method. Setting up station information for player.

Note: Must be called before each startPlay() method invocation.

Note: Player must be stopped before this method call.

Parameters:
si - New radio station information.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if called during plaing.

startPlay

public void startPlay()
               throws java.lang.Exception
Run stream playing loop.

Note: Must be called ater init(ru.mobicomk.mfradio.util.StationInfo) method.

Note: Player must be stopped before this method call.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if called during plaing or if called without initialization (init(ru.mobicomk.mfradio.util.StationInfo)).

stopPlay

public void stopPlay()
Stop stream playing loop.

isPlaying

public boolean isPlaying()
Get information about current player state.

Returns:
true if stream playing loop is running, false othrwise.

setVolume

public void setVolume(int level)
Set the volume using linear point scale with values between 0 and 100. 0 is silence; 100 is the loudest usefull level that current VolumeControl supports. If the given level is less than 0 or greater than 100, the level well be set to 0 or 100 respectively.

Parameters:
level - The new volume specified in the level scale.

getHeaders

public java.util.Hashtable getHeaders()
HTTP headers of the audio stream request accessor.

Returns:
HTTP header of the audio stream request.
